attributes.action: invest more time and resources into looking after the rights of the citizens of the UK then he appears to do at present
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should not forget which country he is Prime Minister of. He appears to be far more willing to invest British Tax Payers money in foreign policies and foreign projects then making worth while investments in the country he was elected in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
